div.h1: Synthetic Data Access Stats Legacy vs New:

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" env=$bbEnvLabel$ host=$bbEnv$ |spath output=name path="message.app_name" | table name | dedup name | sort name

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ | spath output=fhir_id path="message.fhir_id" | regex fhir_id="-199900000\ddddd|-200000000\d\d\d\d\d|-201400000\d\d\d\d\d|-100000000\d\d\d\d\d" | spath output=call_path path="message.path" | regex call_path="/v[12]/fhir/.*" | fields time message.path message.response_code message.fhir_id

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ | spath output=fhir_id path="message.fhir_id" | regex fhir_id="-199900000\ddddd|-200000000\d\d\d\d\d|-201400000\d\d\d\d\d" | spath output=call_path path="message.path" | regex call_path="/v[12]/fhir/.*" | fields time message.path message.response_code message.fhir_id

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ | spath output=fhir_id path="message.fhir_id" | regex fhir_id="-100000000\d\d\d\d\d" | spath output=call_path path="message.path" | regex call_path="/v[12]/fhir/.*" | fields time message.path message.response_code message.fhir_id

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ | spath output=fhir_id path="message.fhir_id" | regex fhir_id="-199900000\ddddd|-200000000\d\d\d\d\d|-201400000\d\d\d\d\d|-100000000\d\d\d\d\d" | spath output=call_path path="message.path" | regex call_path="/v[12]/fhir/Patient.*" | search message.response_code=200 | stats count

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ | spath output=fhir_id path="message.fhir_id" | regex fhir_id="-199900000\ddddd|-200000000\d\d\d\d\d|-201400000\d\d\d\d\d|-100000000\d\d\d\d\d" | spath output=call_path path="message.path" | regex call_path="/v[12]/fhir/Coverage.*" | search message.response_code=200 | stats count

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ | spath output=fhir_id path="message.fhir_id" | regex fhir_id="-199900000\ddddd|-200000000\d\d\d\d\d|-201400000\d\d\d\d\d|-100000000\d\d\d\d\d" | spath output=call_path path="message.path" | regex call_path="/v[12]/fhir/ExplanationOfBenefit.*" | search message.response_code=200 | stats count

panel.title: 4. TOTAL Synthetic FHIR Requests (w/ successful status, might include fhir requests other than Patient, EOB, Coverage, e.g. metadata)

search.query: search message.response_code=200 | stats count

panel.title: 1A. Legacy Synthetic Patient Requests (w/ successful status)

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ | spath output=fhir_id path="message.fhir_id" | regex fhir_id="-199900000\ddddd|-200000000\d\d\d\d\d|-201400000\d\d\d\d\d" | spath output=call_path path="message.path" | regex call_path="/v[12]/fhir/Patient.*" | search message.response_code=200 | stats count

panel.title: 2A. Legacy Synthetic Coverage Requests (w/ successful status)

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ | spath output=fhir_id path="message.fhir_id" | regex fhir_id="-199900000\ddddd|-200000000\d\d\d\d\d|-201400000\d\d\d\d\d" | spath output=call_path path="message.path" | regex call_path="/v[12]/fhir/Coverage.*" | search message.response_code=200 | stats count

panel.title: 3A. Legacy Synthetic EOB Requests (w/ successful status)

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ | spath output=fhir_id path="message.fhir_id" | regex fhir_id="-199900000\ddddd|-200000000\d\d\d\d\d|-201400000\d\d\d\d\d" | spath output=call_path path="message.path" | regex call_path="/v[12]/fhir/ExplanationOfBenefit.*" | search message.response_code=200 | stats count

panel.title: 4A. TOTAL Legacy Synthetic FHIR Requests (w/ successful status, might include fhir requests other than Patient, EOB, Coverage, e.g. metadata)

search.query: search message.response_code=200 | stats count

panel.title: 1B. New Synthetic Patient Requests (w/ successful status)

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ | spath output=fhir_id path="message.fhir_id" | regex fhir_id="-100000000\d\d\d\d\d" | spath output=call_path path="message.path" | regex call_path="/v[12]/fhir/Patient.*" | search message.response_code=200 | stats count

panel.title: 2B. New Synthetic Coverage Requests (w/ successful status)

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ | spath output=fhir_id path="message.fhir_id" | regex fhir_id="-100000000\d\d\d\d\d" | spath output=call_path path="message.path" | regex call_path="/v[12]/fhir/Coverage.*" | search message.response_code=200 | stats count

panel.title: 3B. New Synthetic EOB Requests (w/ successful status)

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ | spath output=fhir_id path="message.fhir_id" | regex fhir_id="-100000000\d\d\d\d\d" | spath output=call_path path="message.path" | regex call_path="/v[12]/fhir/ExplanationOfBenefit.*" | search message.response_code=200 | stats count

panel.title: 4B. TOTAL New Synthetic FHIR Requests (w/ successful status, might include fhir requests other than Patient, EOB, Coverage, e.g. metadata)

search.query: search message.response_code=200 | stats count

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ | spath output=fhir_id path="message.fhir_id" | regex fhir_id="-199900000\ddddd|-200000000\d\d\d\d\d|-201400000\d\d\d\d\d|-100000000\d\d\d\d\d" | spath output=call_path path="message.path" | regex call_path="/v[12]/fhir/Patient.*" | eval synthetic_type=if(match(fhir_id, "-100000000\d\d\d\d\d"), "New", "Legacy") | search message.response_code=200 | stats count by synthetic_type

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ | spath output=fhir_id path="message.fhir_id" | regex fhir_id="-199900000\ddddd|-200000000\d\d\d\d\d|-201400000\d\d\d\d\d|-100000000\d\d\d\d\d" | spath output=call_path path="message.path" | regex call_path="/v[12]/fhir/Coverage.*" | eval synthetic_type=if(match(fhir_id, "-100000000\d\d\d\d\d"), "New", "Legacy") | search message.response_code=200 | stats count by synthetic_type

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ | spath output=fhir_id path="message.fhir_id" | regex fhir_id="-199900000\ddddd|-200000000\d\d\d\d\d|-201400000\d\d\d\d\d|-100000000\d\d\d\d\d" | spath output=call_path path="message.path" | regex call_path="/v[12]/fhir/ExplanationOfBenefit.*" | eval synthetic_type=if(match(fhir_id, "-100000000\d\d\d\d\d"), "New", "Legacy") | search message.response_code=200 | stats count by synthetic_type

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ | spath output=fhir_id path="message.fhir_id" | regex fhir_id="-199900000\ddddd|-200000000\d\d\d\d\d|-201400000\d\d\d\d\d|-100000000\d\d\d\d\d" | spath output=call_path path="message.path" | regex call_path="/v[12]/fhir/.*" | eval synthetic_type=if(match(fhir_id, "-100000000\d\d\d\d\d"), "New", "Legacy") | search message.response_code=200 | stats count by synthetic_type

| spath output=client_id path="message.app_id" | spath output=name path="message.app_name" | spath output=user path="message.dev_name" | where client_id != "" | stats count by client_id, name, user | sort - count
| spath output=client_id path="message.app_id" | where client_id != "" | stats distinct_count(client_id) as cid_total

chart.title: Total Synthetic FHIR Requests OK (200) TIME-CHART

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ | spath output=fhir_id path="message.fhir_id" | regex fhir_id="-199900000\ddddd|-200000000\d\d\d\d\d|-201400000\d\d\d\d\d|-100000000\d\d\d\d\d" | eval synthetic_type=if(match(fhir_id, "-100000000\d\d\d\d\d"), "New", "Legacy") | spath output=call_path path="message.path" | regex call_path="/v[12]/fhir/.*" | timechart count by synthetic_type

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ | spath output=call_path path="message.path" | regex call_path="/v[12]/fhir/.*" | spath output=fhir_id path="message.fhir_id" | eval synthetic_type=case(match(fhir_id, "-100000000\d\d\d\d\d"), "New", match(fhir_id, "-199900000\ddddd|-200000000\d\d\d\d\d|-201400000\d\d\d\d\d"), "Legacy", 1=1, "Other") | timechart count by synthetic_type
